import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Axios from'axios'; import '../App.css' import Doctor from '../components/doctorDashboard' function Profile() { const[list, setList]=useState([]) const [name,setName]=useState('') const [password,setPassword]=useState('') const [designation,setDesignation]=useState('') const [gender,setGender]=useState('') const [address,setAddress]=useState('') const [highest_qualification,setHighest_Qualification]=useState('') const getData = () => { Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/profile').then(res => { setList(res.data) }) } getData() const updateProfile = (name, password, designation, gender, address, highest_qualification) =>{ Axios.put("http://localhost:3001/update_profile", { name:name, password:password, designation:designation, gender:gender, address:address, highest_qualification:highest_qualification }) } return(
{/*

Your Profile

*/}

Sign In to your account.

{setEmail(e.target.value)}}/>
{/* Error Message */}
{setPassword(e.target.value)}} />
{/* Error Message */}

Account Details

{list.map((val,key)=>{ return( {setName(e.target.value)}} value={val.name} /> {/*
*/} ) })}
{setPassword(e.target.value)}} value={val.password}/>
{setDesignation(e.target.value)}} value={val.designation} />
{setGender(e.target.value)}} value={val.gender}/>
{setAddress(e.target.value)}} value={val.address}/>
{setHighest_Qualification(e.target.value)}} value={val.highest_qualification}/>
) } export default Profile;
